trigger_description: This trigger fires every time someone unlocks or unlatches the door.
This trigger fires every time the Smart Lock state changes to uncalibrated.
This trigger fires every week, if the battery state of the Smart Lock is critical.
This trigger fires every time someone closes the door. (Only supported for activated door sensor.)
This trigger fires every time someone opens the door. (Only supported for activated door sensor.)
This trigger fires every time someone unlocks the door with Auto Unlock.
This trigger fires every time someone locks the door.
This trigger fires every time someone locks the door with Lock 'n' Go by pressing the button on the Smart Lock twice.
